front.title: NIST customer demographics

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This economic analysis brief summarizes the efforts and results of the data collection and analysis of NIST's patent licensee information. Summary statistics for licensees are provided for fiscal years 2006 through 2015. Included in the analysis are demographically descriptive variables such as the age, location, North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes, number of employees and geographic distribution of NIST licensees. Overall, this publication provides demographics of companies that licensed NIST technologies.

seriesInfo.name: NIST economic analysis brief; NIST EAB
